result.eng: Are you coming in?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú ag teacht isteach
result.orig: An bhfuil tú ag teacht isteach
result.html: An bhfuil tú ag teacht isteachAre you coming in?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú ag teaċt isteaċAre you coming in?

result.eng: Will you be coming tonight?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú ag teacht anocht
result.orig: An mbeidh tú ag teacht anocht
result.html: An mbeidh tú ag teacht anochtWill you be coming tonight?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú ag teaċt anoċtWill you be coming tonight?

result.eng: I felt like coming here.
result.ga: Bhí fonn orm teacht anseo
result.orig: Bhí fonn orm teacht anseo
result.html: Bhí fonn orm teacht anseoI felt like coming here.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí fonn orm teaċt anseoI felt like coming here.

result.eng: You were supposed to come half an hour ago!
result.ga: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shin
result.orig: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shin
result.html: Bhí tú in ainm teacht leathuair an chloig ó shinYou were supposed to come half an hour ago!
result.ponchtml: Ḃí tú in ainm teaċt leaṫuair an ċloig ó ẛinYou were supposed to come half an hour ago!

result.eng: A lot of people come here in the summer.
result.ga: Bíonn an-chuid daoine ag teacht anseo i rith an tsamhraidh
result.orig: Bíonn an-chuid daoine ag teacht anseo i rith an tsamhraidh
result.html: Bíonn an-chuid daoine ag teacht anseo i rith an tsamhraidhA lot of people come here in the summer.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an-ċuid daoine ag teaċt anseo i riṫ an tsaṁraiḋA lot of people come here in the summer.

result.eng: I saw her coming towards me across the street.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráide
result.orig: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráide
result.html: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráideI saw her coming towards me across the street.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í agus í ag teaċt ċugam trasna na sráideI saw her coming towards me across the street.

result.eng: Look who's coming our way!
result.ga: Féach cé atá ag teacht i leith
result.orig: Féach cé atá ag teacht i leith
result.html: Féach cé atá ag teacht i leithLook who's coming our way!
result.ponchtml: Féaċ cé atá ag teaċt i leiṫLook who's coming our way!

result.eng: Look, the rain is coming.
result.ga: Féach tá an bháisteach ag teacht
result.orig: Féach tá an bháisteach ag teacht
result.html: Féach tá an bháisteach ag teachtLook, the rain is coming.
result.ponchtml: Féaċ tá an ḃáisteaċ ag teaċtLook, the rain is coming.

result.eng: Thank you for coming tonight.
result.ga: Go raibh maith agat as teacht anocht
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat as teacht anocht
result.html: Go raibh maith agat as teacht anochtThank you for coming tonight.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat as teaċt anoċtThank you for coming tonight.

result.eng: They walked back to the place from which they had come.
result.ga: Shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teacht
result.orig: Shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teacht
result.html: Shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teachtThey walked back to the place from which they had come.
result.ponchtml: Ṡiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raiḃ siad tar éis teaċtThey walked back to the place from which they had come.

result.eng: After all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
result.ga: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.orig: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.html: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteachAfter all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis an aiġnis ar fad d'éiriġ linn teaċt ar réiteaċAfter all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.

result.eng: The bus is coming.
result.ga: Tá an bus ag teacht
result.orig: Tá an bus ag teacht
result.html: Tá an bus ag teachtThe bus is coming.
result.ponchtml: Tá an bus ag teaċtThe bus is coming.

result.eng: My mathematical skills are improving.
result.ga: Tá feabhas ag teacht ar mo chuid scileanna matamaitice
result.orig: Tá feabhas ag teacht ar mo chuid scileanna matamaitice
result.html: Tá feabhas ag teacht ar mo chuid scileanna matamaiticeMy mathematical skills are improving.
result.ponchtml: Tá feaḃas ag teaċt ar mo ċuid scileanna matamaiticeMy mathematical skills are improving.

result.eng: He is coming over from England.
result.ga: Tá sé ag teacht anall as Sasana
result.orig: Tá sé ag teacht anall as Sasana
result.html: Tá sé ag teacht anall as SasanaHe is coming over from England.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag teaċt anall as SasanaHe is coming over from England.

result.eng: He's coming down from the stage.
result.ga: Tá sé ag teacht anuas ón stáitse
result.orig: Tá sé ag teacht anuas ón stáitse
result.html: Tá sé ag teacht anuas ón stáitseHe's coming down from the stage.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag teaċt anuas ón stáitseHe's coming down from the stage.

result.eng: I am late each day to university.
result.ga: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoil
result.orig: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoil
result.html: Bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoilI am late each day to university.
result.ponchtml: Bím mall 'ċuile lá ag teaċt ċuig an ollscoilI am late each day to university.

result.eng: I am improving.
result.ga: Tá feabhas ag teacht orm
result.orig: Tá feabhas ag teacht orm
result.html: Tá feabhas ag teacht ormI am improving.
result.ponchtml: Tá feaḃas ag teaċt ormI am improving.

result.eng: I am coming to the meeting.
result.ga: Tá mé ag teacht chuig an gcruinniú
result.orig: Tá mé ag teacht chuig an gcruinniú
result.html: Tá mé ag teacht chuig an gcruinniúI am coming to the meeting.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag teaċt ċuig an gcruinniúI am coming to the meeting.

result.eng: Would you like to come to dinner with me tonight?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat teacht le haghaidh dinnéir liom
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat teacht le haghaidh dinnéir liom
result.html: Ar mhaith leat teacht le haghaidh dinnéir liomWould you like to come to dinner with me tonight?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat teaċt le haġaiḋ dinnéir liomWould you like to come to dinner with me tonight?

result.eng: Would you like to come to my party?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat teacht chuig mo chóisir
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat teacht chuig mo chóisir
result.html: Ar mhaith leat teacht chuig mo chóisirWould you like to come to my party?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat teaċt ċuig mo ċóisirWould you like to come to my party?

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.orig: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.html: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bithHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag breaṫnú ar an doras aṁail is go ḃféadfaḋ an t-áiḃirseoir féin teaċt isteaċ nóiméad ar biṫHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.

result.eng: We were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.
result.ga: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit AontaitheWe were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí aíonna le ḃeiṫ ag teaċt isteaċ as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit AontaiṫeWe were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.

result.eng: Why was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ga: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.orig: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.html: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimhWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ an raiḃ deataċ ag teaċt ó ḋá ṫaoḃ an ḟoirgniṁWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?

result.eng: Reports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ga: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.orig: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.html: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ tuairiscí ag teaċt as Waẛington gur buaileaḋ an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.

result.eng: Around the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ga: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.orig: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.html: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ponchtml: Ṫart fán am ar ṫit túr eile an Lárionaid ḃí tuairiscí ag teaċt isteaċ go raiḃ scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.

result.eng: I'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ga: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.orig: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.html: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duitI'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mise anseo fá do ċoinne ag teaċt duitI'll be here for you when you come back.

result.eng: The night is coming, where will I rest my head?
result.ga: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheann
result.orig: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheann
result.html: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheannThe night is coming, where will I rest my head?
result.ponchtml: Tá an oíċe ag teaċt agus cá leagfaiḋ mé mo ċeannThe night is coming, where will I rest my head?
